TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed NotificationFlags extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Enumerates values returned by several types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags AutoCancel = int32(16)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that should be set if the notification should be canceled when it is clicked by the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags ForegroundService = int32(64)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that should be set if this notification represents a currently running service. This will normally be set for you by .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags GroupSummary = int32(512)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags HighPriority = int32(128)

summary.para: Obsolete flag indicating high-priority notifications; use the priority field instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags Insistent = int32(4)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that if set, the audio will be repeated until the notification is cancelled or the notification window is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags LocalOnly = int32(256)
.field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags NoClear = int32(32)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that should be set if the notification should not be canceled when the user clicks the Clear all button.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags OngoingEvent = int32(2)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that should be set if this notification is in reference to something that is ongoing, like a phone call. It should not be set if this notification is in reference to something that happened at a particular point in time, like a missed phone call.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags OnlyAlertOnce = int32(8)

summary.para: Bit to be bitwise-ored into the field that should be set if you want the sound and/or vibration play each time the notification is sent, even if it has not been canceled before that.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.App.NotificationFlags ShowLights = int32(1)

item.term: To turn the LED off, pass 0 in the alpha channel for colorARGB or 0 for both ledOnMS and ledOffMS.
To turn the LED on, pass 1 for ledOnMS and 0 for ledOffMS.
To flash the LED, pass the number of milliseconds that it should be on and off to ledOnMS and ledOffMS.

summary.para: The alpha channel must be set for forward compatibility.
